text: (too mere bete ko najaat de) khuda ne pharamaaya ai nooh tum (ye kya kah rahe ho) haragiz vah tumhaare ahal mein shaamil nahin vah beshak badachalan hai (dekho jisaka tumhen ilm nahin hai mujhase usake baare mein (darakhvaast na kiya karo aur naadaanon kee see baaten na karo) nooh ne arz kee ai mere paravaradigaar mai tujh hee se panaah maaganta hoon ki jis cheez ka mujhe ilm na ho mai usakee darakhvaast karun
